head.title: RabbitMQ - Contact

body.p: We host the rabbitmq-discuss list for discussions about RabbitMQ. Once you join you can get help with technical issues, ask questions and share your experiences with RabbitMQ.

ul.li: You can also access the list through gmane, google-groups, and nabble

body.p:
If you want to be notified of new releases and other important RabbitMQ announcements please sign up to the rabbitmq-announce list.
Email
You can contact us by email using one of the following addresses:
For general and sales enquiriesinfo@rabbitmq.com
For help installing or using RabbitMQsupport@rabbitmq.com
If you have a genuine complaint or need to rantlegitimategrievance@rabbitmq.com
Location
RabbitMQ
c/o VMware UK
Bluefin Building
110, Southwark Street
London SE1 0TA
United Kingdom
